ctx: intros f p q r s x y H.
exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rplus_0_r (_ + 0) does not match any subterm of the goal

ctx: intros f p q r s x y H.
exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R -> R p, q, r, s : nat x, y : R Hq : q = 0%nat Unable to unify "Derive_n (fun t : R => Derive_n (fun z : R => f t z) s y) (p + r) x" with "Derive_n (fun t : R => Derive_n (fun t0 : R => Derive_n (fun z : R => f t0 z) s y) r t) p x".

ctx: intros f p q r s x y H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros f p q r s x y H.
exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R -> R p, q, r, s : nat x, y : R Hr : r = 0%nat Unable to unify "Derive_n (fun t : R => Derive_n (fun z : R => f t z) (q + s) y) (p + 0) x" with "Derive_n (fun t : R => Derive_n (fun z : R => Derive_n (fun z0 : R => f t z0) s z) q y) p x".

original: intros f p q r s x y H. destruct H as [Hq | Hr]. - rewrite Hq. unfold partial_derive. simpl. rewrite Rplus_0_r. reflexivity. - rewrite Hr. unfold partial_derive. simpl. reflexivity.
